text: Széchenyi mansion Aerial photograph The Széchenyi mansion () is a historic mansion in Nagycenk, Hungary. It was built in the Baroque style by the Széchenyi family through consecutive generations. Today, it serves as a memorial museum of István Széchenyi, its most famous resident. ==References== * == External links == Category:Széchenyi family Category:Museums in Győr- Moson-Sopron County Category:Biographical museums in Hungary Category:Historic house museums in Hungary
title: Széchenyi Mansion
